summary: Birthdays are special days to celebrate the anniversary of someone's birth. People often mark this occasion with cakes, gifts, and parties. A common tradition is to light candles on the cake, often matching the person's age, and make a wish. Birthdays are a global celebration, with different cultures having unique ways to mark the day. Some religions also honor the birthdays of important figures with special holidays. The term "birthday" refers to the annual celebration, while "birthdate" is the exact date of birth.
title: Birthday
